column7: 2015 at the age of 87. proceeded in death by her husband robert and her son michael. loving mother of kathy (tom) perszyk
column10: and bill (annette) dews. further survived by many grandchildren and great grandchildren. the family wishes to thank the staffs at the francis house and heartland hospice for their special care and support. visitation will be held from 3:00-4:30 pm with a short service to follow at heritage funeral home on friday june 19
column12: memorials may be made to the alzheimers association or charity of your choice. heritage funeral homes johnson-reiss klemmer-scheuerell-tyborski 9200 s. 27th st. 414-761-2750 www. heritagefuneral. com upcoming events. memorial service. jun 19. 3:00 pm - 4:30 pm heritage funeral home - oak creek9200 s. 27th st. oak creek
